name: Purrfect Catch
summary:
The Dogs need your help! Work together with your feline companion to save the dogs across all manner of magical levels!
A cat-astrophe has occurred, giving the dogs an unwanted bath. Band together with your Cat and Rod and bring them back to dry land. Customise your equipment using the Locker Room, and use unique perks to save more dogs than ever before - and don't forget to go for the high score.
